Items

C

Cimmeris' Skull

A human skull which contains the essence of a Shade Elemental from the Umbra Plane.

G

Gauntlet of Flamefury

artifact

A gauntlet adorned with ancient runes that channels fire magic, enabling the warlord to summon and control flames with devastating effect.

Level: 5

Projects a small physical explosive up to a long distance away that bursts in an immediate radius, causing the cypher level ambient fire damage (avoids armor) setting fire to all unworn flammable objects. Remaining in the blast area causes +1 ambient fire damage/round.

Depletion: 1 on a 1d10

S

Scepter of Fire and Earth

Artifact

Level: Unknown

Effects Unknown

Depletion: Unknown

U

Urn of Perpetual Water

Artifact

Level: 1

The urn has 3 modes:

  • Stream which produces 1 gallon of water
  • Fountain which produces 5 gallons of water
  • Geyser which produces 30 gallons of water that gushes forth in a geyser 30 feet long and 1 foot wide. (if aimed at a creature make a might defense throw and if failed take 3 bludgeoning damage and the creature is knocked prone)

Depletion: 1 on 1d10

V

Vial of Mind Disrupting Venom

Artifact

Level: 6

The Vial contains the venom of a Giant Glowing Wasp. The victim suffers Intellect damage equal to the artifact's level and cannot take actions for a number of rounds equal to the artifact's level.Â (394)

Depletion: 1 on 1d4
